questions.title: What region to you operate in?
Would you like to tell us the exact area that you operate in?
Which quarter is this needs assessment for?
How many total 'people of concern' live in the region where you operate?
questions.description: e.g. total number of people living in an RIC and apartments

questions.title: How many unique people does your organisation support in a month?
questions.description: This is the number of individuals you support; if you serve the same person multiple times in a month, please do not count them multiple times!

questions.title: How many times on average do you serve one person over the course of a month?
questions.description: e.g. if you serve the same people one meal a day, you would serve an individual 30 times a month.

questions.title: Is the region's population trending upwards, downwards, stagnant, or hard to say?
Which of the following types of aid does your organisation provide? Please select all that apply
questions.internalComment: if clothing is selected, this triggers the question `clothing-distribution` about which types of clothing

questions.title: Whom do you primarily serve? Pease select all that apply
Which types of the following clothing does your organisation distribute? Please select all that apply
questions.internalComment: only display if clothing selected on `aid-types` and make this question required. Each answer choice triggers a page for needs data about that type of clothing if selected.

questions.title: What is the size of your warehouse, in square meters (m²)?
Which quarter is this needs assessment for?

sections.title: Hygiene tiems
sections.description: How many hygiene items do you need for the quarter? Remember, please do not include a need if you already have those items on hand or have a confirmed donation of those items in the quarter.
sections.internalComment: This set of questions should only appear to the survey taker if they checked the corresponding box on the 'Whom you serve' section

sections.title: Shelter and Storage
sections.description: How many shelter and storage items do you need for the quarter? Remember, please do not include a need if you already have those items on hand or have a confirmed donation of those items in the quarter.

sections.title: Education and Employability Services
sections.description: How many educational material items do you need for the quarter? Remember, please do not include a need if you already have those items on hand or have a confirmed donation of those items in the quarter.

sections.title: Food items
sections.description: How many food items do you need for the quarter? Remember, please do not include a need if you already have those items on hand or have a confirmed donation of those items in the quarter.

sections.title: Women's clothing
sections.description: How many do you need for the selected quarter? Remember, please do not include a need if you already have those items on hand or have a confirmed donation of those items in the selected quarter.
sections.internalComment: This set of questions should only appear to the survey taker if they checked the corresponding box on the 'Whom you serve' section

sections.title: Men's clothing
